amendment.description: To replace "tribal consortia" with "tribal energy resource development organizations", and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 864 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 864 proposed by Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S7459-7462) To replace "tribal consortia" with "tribal energy resource development organizations", and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 864 proposed by Senator Campbell.
